sqlMap.select:
SELECT REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", ID as "id", ORIGIN_BILL_NO as "originBillNo", ORIGIN_BILL_TYPE as "originBillType", ORIGIN_BILL_TYPE_NAME as "originBillTypeName", WARE_HOUSE_NO as "wareHouseNo", ware_house_name as "wareHouseName", STORAGE_NO as "storageNo", STACK_NO as "stackNo", mat_type_num as "matTypeNum", mat_type_name as "matTypeName", MAT_NUM as "matNum", MAT_NAME as "matName", MAT_MODEL as "matModel", MAT_SPEC as "matSpec", UNIT as "unit", UNIT_NAME as "unitName", PRICE as "price", BEFORE_NUM as "beforeNum", BEFORE_AMOUNT as "beforeAmount", AFTER_NUM as "afterNum", AFTER_AMOUNT as "afterAmount", batch_no as "batchNo" FROM si_storge_record WHERE 1=1
ID = #id#
ORIGIN_BILL_NO = #originBillNo#
ORIGIN_BILL_NO like concat('%', #originBillNoLK#, '%')
WARE_HOUSE_NO = #wareHouseNo#
MAT_NUM = #matNum#
MAT_NUM like concat('%', #matNumLK#, '%')
MAT_NAME like concat('%', #matName#, '%')
batch_no = #batchNo#
ORIGIN_BILL_NO = (select ENTER_BILL_NO from si_enter where ORIGIN_BILL_NO = #transBillNo#)
ORIGIN_BILL_NO = (select out_bill_no from si_out where ORIGIN_BILL_NO = #outTransBillNo#)
$orderBy$
REC_CREATE_TIME desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM .si_storge_record WHERE 1=1
ID = #id#
ORIGIN_BILL_NO = #originBillNo#
ORIGIN_BILL_NO like concat('%', #originBillNoLK#, '%')
WARE_HOUSE_NO = #wareHouseNo#
MAT_NUM = #matNum#
MAT_NUM like concat('%', #matNumLK#, '%')
MAT_NAME like concat('%', #matName#, '%')
batch_no = #batchNo#
ORIGIN_BILL_NO = (select ENTER_BILL_NO from si_enter where ORIGIN_BILL_NO = #transBillNo#)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO si_storge_record (REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, ARCHIVE_FLAG, ID, ORIGIN_BILL_NO, ORIGIN_BILL_TYPE, ORIGIN_BILL_TYPE_NAME, WARE_HOUSE_NO, ware_house_name, STORAGE_NO, STACK_NO, mat_type_num, mat_type_name, MAT_NUM, MAT_NAME, MAT_MODEL, MAT_SPEC, UNIT, UNIT_NAME, PRICE, BEFORE_NUM, BEFORE_AMOUNT, AFTER_NUM, AFTER_AMOUNT, batch_no ) VALUES (#recCreator#, #recCreateTime#, #recRevisor#, #recReviseTime#, #archiveFlag#, #id#, #originBillNo#, #originBillType#, #originBillTypeName#, #wareHouseNo#, #wareHouseName#, #storageNo#, #stackNo#, #matTypeNum#, #matTypeName#, #matNum#, #matName#, #matModel#, #matSpec#, #unit#, #unitName#, #price#, #beforeNum#, #beforeAmount#, #afterNum#, #afterAmount#, #batchNo#)
